Arsene is a student at Pomona College majoring in Computer Science and Geology with a minor in Data Science. In his free time, he plays video games, does origami, and competes as part of the Claremont Men's Volleyball Club. He is involved in the Pomona LXA and Claremont Colleges ALPFA chapter, and is a Posse Scholar from Miami, FL.
